name: Monuments To Guilt
description:
Take a first-person wander through Monuments to Guilt, a short exhibition exploring exclusionary design. Acquaint yourself with the core principles of this harmful practice, re-evaluate the objects you see every day and let guilt sit with you, for just a little while.

This is a relatively high demand on PC's, so I'm also working on an interactive website version to allow more people access to it.

If this speaks to you in any way, consider donating to your local homelessness charity. Here's one of mine. https://womenscentre.org.uk/

-louis

_____

Controls

  • WASD __ walk
  • Mouse __ look
  • Rclick __ zoom
  • Esc __ pause/quit

Alternatively, you can use Lclick to accelerate, allowing you to just use the mouse to play - if that's easier for you.
